solution_line_template: Enrico was able to sell the {rooster_1_weight}-kilogram rooster for {rooster_1_weight} x {price_per_kg} = $<<{rooster_1_weight}*{price_per_kg}={rooster_1_price}>>{rooster_1_price}.
And he was able to sell the {rooster_2_weight}-kilogram rooster for {rooster_2_weight} x {price_per_kg}= $<<{rooster_2_weight}*{price_per_kg}={rooster_2_price}>>{rooster_2_price}.
Therefore, he was able to earn ${rooster_2_price} + ${rooster_1_price} = $<<{rooster_2_price}+{rooster_1_price}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}.
